description:
This bug is register for skip some tempest test for nova v3 blueprint. Because skip_because only support bug number.

The patch is here
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/73000/1

The related blueprint:
https://blueprints.launchpad.net/openstack/?searchtext=v3-api-core

If this is wrong way...please let me know.
title: Disable auto allocate network for v3 api
